title: 网吧不能启动游戏
author: Yorihime
txt_content:
java也下载好了。都设置正确但是点击启动游戏以后没有任何反应 
任务进程倒是有[img=0,1]file:///C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\Tencent\Users\1305258480\QQ\WinTemp\RichOle\X`N(9[0JK~QB~_M~`{()8Z2.png[/img]

replies.author: gamemode3
replies.txt_content: 可能是因为没安装Java7,话说LZ你暴露QQ号了_(:зゝ∠)_

replies.author: luxiaochen1984
replies.txt_content:
试试安装java7：http://dx.crsky.com/soft/37524.html
并且设置中定位C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe
按照你给出的应该是java6.。

replies.author: 小析
replies.txt_content: 网吧网吧 当然是网吧的问题了

replies.author: q8585449
replies.txt_content: 骚年，你在网吧装MC就是浪费时间
